mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cartno, contentsno, memberno, cnt, rdate) VALUES(cart_seq.nextval, #{contentsno}, #{memberno}, #{cnt}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT t.cartno, c.contentsno, c.title, c.thumb1, c.price, c.dc, c.saleprice, c.point, t.memberno, t.cnt, t.rdate FROM contents c, cart t WHERE (c.contentsno = t.contentsno) AND t.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY cartno ASC
